name: OCKAnyCarePlanQuery
desc: A protocol required for care plan queries, which provides customizing and sorting query results for care plan data.

items.name: init(OCKAnyCarePlanQuery)
items.desc: Creates a new care plan query from a specific query.

items.name: var patientIDs: [String]
items.desc: An array of patient identifiers you can use to match care plans in the query-returned results.

items.name: var sortDescriptors: [OCKCarePlanSortDescriptor]
items.desc: The order in which you want to sort the query results.
